heading: End Game Boss Loot Table Cheat Sheet
content: With the introduction of the new Bosses, we decided to create this End Game Boss Loot Table Cheat Sheet. A quick, easy reference sheet for all five bosses with embeds of all the gear that's tied to each Boss. Be sure to favorite it to come back to once you get into and can start tackling them. With this absolute massive patch coming, the game as we know it is going to shift quite a bit! The will be breaking down all parts of this patch down into Seasonal Guides in our Resources menu. We're working on New & updated (with season release), updated , and more that you have come to expect from us. With that said, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 2 experience! Written by: Reviewed by:
